Google Scholar

About me

I am a third-year Ph.D. student at UTNS (UT Austin Networked Systems group), advised by Prof. Aditya Akella and Prof. Venkat Arun.

My research applies AI techniques to improve performance (e.g., throughput, latency) and usability of modern computer systems, such as data analytics, ML training/serving frameworks, OS, and networks.

In 2023, I got my BS degree at Turing Class, Peking University, worked with Prof. Tong Yang.
